greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of limiting ratio described in Comments.
comment: As in A274193, define g(n,k) = 1 for n >= 0; g(n,k) = 0 if k > n; g(n,k) = g(n-1,k-1) + g(n-1,4k) for n > 0, k > 1.  The sum of numbers in the n-th row of the array {g(n,k)} is given by A274197, and "limiting ratio" = limit of A274197(n)/A274197(n-1).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 16 2016
